Package com.objetdirect.tatami.client.dnd

Interface Summary
IDnDBehavior<E extends IDnDElement,S extends IDnDSource<?>,T extends IDnDTarget>  
IDnDElement This interface represents a draggable Element.
IDnDSource<T extends IDnDElement> This interface represents a Drag and Drop Source.
IDnDTarget This interface represents a drag n drop target.
 

Class Summary
AbstractDnDBehavior<E extends IDnDElement,S extends IDnDSource<? extends E>,T extends IDnDTarget>  
DnD  
DnDBehaviors This class is a static DnDBehavior registry It comprises register and unregister methods for applying IDnDBehavior to specific IDnDSource or IDnDTargets
DnDDefaultWidgetBehavior This class implements a default WidgetBehavior.
DnDGenericBehavior<E extends IDnDElement> This class implements a default generic behavior.
DnDMainController This class acts as a super-dndcontroller.
DnDSourceTargetRegistry<K,S extends IDnDSource<?>,T extends IDnDTarget>  
DnDTreeController This class is the tree drag and drop controller.
DndTreeElement A IDnDElement implementation for managing drag and drop operations for TreeItems.
IDnDController<T extends IDnDSource<?>,U extends IDnDTarget>  
TreeSource This class implements IDnDSource to provide a drag and drop source from a tree.
TreeTarget  
WidgetDnDBehavior This class is designed to make the Behavior implementor work easier.
WidgetDnDController This class is the widget drag and drop controller.
WidgetDnDElement This class implements a IDnDElement for a widget.
WidgetSource Implements a DnDSource for widgets.
WidgetTarget This class represents a WidgetTarget, that means, a Panel which can accept drops.
 

Exception Summary
DnDBehaviors.BehaviorScopeException A behavior scope exception is thrown when a behavior cannot be registered for the given source and target, usually because another behavior was already registered.
JSSourceCreationException This exception can be thrown by controllers when it is impossible to create the source.
